b662314521c92096bbbe32ca7d217af800af6aa2.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to 4... | tools:11

response.content: Grom’s ears are open only to stories that tug at something he holds dear—try to learn what he cares about, then weave a tale that mirrors that, and he’ll be more willing to open up.
